definition[0]: a place that is cosy is small, comfortable, and warm
example[0]: The living room was warm and cosy.
definition[1]: a situation that is cosy is comfortable and friendly
definition[2]: having a close connection or relationship, especially one you do not approve of
example[2]: He was accused of being too cosy with some clients.
definition[3]: a covering for a teapot that keeps the tea inside from getting cold too quickly
